name: MongoDB
description:
MongoDB is a cross-platform document-oriented program which is classified as a NoSQL database.
This connector allows you to connect to the Mongo database via different connection URLs in order to perform CRUD operations on the database.

operations.name: find
operations.description: FindDocuments

params.name: collection
params.description: A grouping of MongoDB documents.

params.name: query
params.description: Specifies selection filter using query operators.

params.name: projection
params.description: Specifies the fields to return in the documents that match the query filter.

params.name: collation
params.description: Specifies the collation to use for the operation.

params.name: sort
params.description: Specifies the order in which the query returns matching documents.

params.name: limit
params.description: Specifies the maximum number of returned documents.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

params.description: Specifies whether the insert should be ordered or unordered.

params.name: connectionName
params.description: The name for the MongoDB connection

params.name: inputType
params.description: Method to construct the connection URI. The connection string URI is a single string that contains all the information needed to connect to the database. The connection parameters are individual fields that can be used to construct the connection URI.

params.name: useDnsSrvLookup
params.description: Enable DNS SRV lookup for automatic server discovery. If not selected, you have to provide a seed list of hosts (if there are multiple hosts). If selected, the you have to provide the cluster root domain name (e.g. mongodb.example.com) in the host field. The driver will then use DNS SRV records to discover the hosts in the cluster.

params.name: connectionURI
params.description: The complete connection URI containing the server details, credentials, and the connection options. [prefix]://[username:password@]host1[:port1][,...hostN[:portN]][/[defaultauthdb][?options]]

params.name: database
params.description: The name of the database.

params.name: host
params.description: The host where the MongoDB instance is running.

params.name: port
params.description: The port where the MongoDB instance is running.

params.name: seedList
params.description: The list of host and port pairs.

params.name: database
params.description: The name of the database.

params.name: username
params.description: User's authentication credentials.

params.name: password
params.description: User's authentication credentials.

params.name: replicaSet
params.description: Specifies the name of the replica set.

params.name: authSource
params.description: Specifies the database name associated with the user's credentials.

params.name: authMechanism
params.description: Specify the authentication mechanism that MongoDB will use to authenticate the connection.

params.name: authMechanismProperties
params.description: Specify properties for the specified authMechanism as a comma-separated list of colon-separated key-value pairs.

params.name: gssapiServiceName
params.description: Set the Kerberos service name when connecting to Kerberized MongoDB instances.

params.name: w
params.description: Corresponds to the write concern w Option.

params.name: wtimeoutMS
params.description: Specifies a time limit, in milliseconds, for the write concern.

params.name: journal
params.description: Corresponds to the write concern j Option option.

params.name: maxPoolSize
params.description: The maximum number of connections in the connection pool.

params.name: minPoolSize
params.description: The minimum number of connections in the connection pool.

params.name: maxIdleTimeMS
params.description: The maximum number of milliseconds that a connection can remain idle in the pool before being removed and closed.

params.name: waitQueueMultiple
params.description: The maximum number of threads allowed to wait for a connection to become available from the pool.

params.name: waitQueueTimeoutMS
params.description: The maximum time in milliseconds that a thread can wait for a connection to become available.

params.name: ssl
params.description: The boolean to enable or disables TLS/SSL for the connection.

params.name: sslInvalidHostNamesAllowed
params.description: Disables hostname validation of the certificate presented by the mongod/mongos instance.

params.name: connectTimeoutMS
params.description: The time in milliseconds to attempt a connection before timing out.

params.name: socketTimeoutMS
params.description: The time in milliseconds to attempt a send or receive on a socket before the attempt times out.

params.name: compressors
params.description: Comma-delimited string of compressors to enable network compression for communication between this client and a mongod/mongos instance.

params.name: zlibCompressionLevel
params.description: An integer that specifies the compression level if using zlib for network compression.

params.name: readConcernLevel
params.description: The level of isolation.

params.name: readPreference
params.description: Specifies the read preferences for this connection.

params.name: maxStalenessSeconds
params.description: Specifies, in seconds, how stale a secondary can be before the client stops using it for read operations.

params.name: readPreferenceTags
params.description: Specifies the tags document as a comma-separated list of colon-separated key-value pairs.

params.name: localThresholdMS
params.description: The size (in milliseconds) of the latency window for selecting among multiple suitable MongoDB instances.

params.name: serverSelectionTimeoutMS
params.description: Specifies how long (in milliseconds) to block for server selection before throwing an exception.

params.name: serverSelectionTryOnce
params.description: Single-threaded drivers only.

params.name: heartbeatFrequencyMS
params.description: Controls when the driver checks the state of the MongoDB deployment.

params.name: appName
params.description: Specify a custom app name.

params.name: retryReads
params.description: Enables retryable reads.

params.name: retryWrites
params.description: Enable retryable writes.

params.name: uuidRepresentation
params.description: The type of UUID representation.

operations.name: init
operations.description: MongoDB connection configuration.

operations.name: deleteOne
operations.description: Removes a single document from a collection.

operations.name: deleteMany
operations.description: Removes all documents that match the filter from a collection.

operations.name: findOne
operations.description: Finds a single document in a collection.

operations.name: find
operations.description: Finds several documents in a collection.

operations.name: insertOne
operations.description: Inserts a document into a collection.

operations.name: insertMany
operations.description: Inserts several documents into a collection.

operations.name: updateOne
operations.description: Modifies an existing document in a collection.

operations.name: updateMany
operations.description: Modifies several documents in a collection.

operations.name: aggregate
operations.description: Aggregation to process multiple documents and return result.

connections.name: STANDARD
connections.description: Standard MongoDB connection with explicit parameters.

connections.name: DSL
connections.description: MongoDB connection using MongoDB configuration DSL.

connections.name: URI
connections.description: MongoDB connection using a MongoDB connection URI.
